Headline: Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks at 18th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks at 18th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute near Madison/Wood
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses temp EB: Madison, Wood, Warren, Ashland, Madison; WB:  Ashland, Washington, Wood, Madison, due to street blockage, near Madison/Wood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Madison/Wood due to street blockage. 

Eastbound buses will operate via: Madison, Wood, Warren, Ashland, Madison;

Westbound buses will operate via: Ashland, Washington, Wood, Madison.

Allow extra travel time.
